node.title: Practical Health Evangelism
node.description: Find out why health ministry is so important in fulfilling the great commission and why it’s the best application for using Christ’s method in evangelism. This seminar will explore current trends in health evangelism, what’s working best and what some of the common challenges are. Practical examples and testimonies will be shared from around the world to instruct and inspire towards building your own successful community health outreach.
